workouts.title: Upper Body Workout
workouts.description: A workout that focuses on strengthening the upper body.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.notes: Remember to keep your elbows in and push through your chest.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.notes: Use a wide grip to target your lats.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Don't lock out your elbows at the top of the lift.

workouts.title: Leg Day
workouts.description: A workout that focuses on strengthening the legs.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.notes: Make sure to keep your knees over your toes and your back straight.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.notes: Don't round your back when lifting the weight.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.notes: Use a slow and controlled movement for the best results.
